org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode

Class BackupImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.FSImage
      • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.BackupImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class BackupImage
extends FSImage
    Extension of FSImage for the backup node. This class handles the setup of the journaling spool on the backup namenode.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Field Detail

      • backupInputStream

        private final EditLogBackupInputStream backupInputStream
        Backup input stream for loading edits into memory

      • bnState

        volatile BackupImage.BNState bnState
        Current state of the BackupNode. The BackupNode's state transitions are as follows: Initial: DROP_UNTIL_NEXT_ROLL - Transitions to JOURNAL_ONLY the next time the log rolls - Transitions to IN_SYNC in convergeJournalSpool - Transitions back to JOURNAL_ONLY if the log rolls while stopApplyingOnNextRoll is true.

      • stopApplyingEditsOnNextRoll

        private boolean stopApplyingEditsOnNextRoll
        Flag to indicate that the next time the NN rolls, the BN should transition from to JOURNAL_ONLY state. freezeNamespaceAtNextRoll()

      • namesystem

        private FSNamesystem namesystem

      throws IOException
        Construct a backup image.
        Parameters:
        conf - Configuration
        Throws:
        IOException - if storage cannot be initialised.

    • Method Detail

      • getNamesystem

        FSNamesystem getNamesystem()

      • setNamesystem

        void setNamesystem(FSNamesystem fsn)

      • recoverCreateRead

        void recoverCreateRead()
                 throws IOException
        Analyze backup storage directories for consistency.
        Recover from incomplete checkpoints if required.
        Read VERSION and fstime files if exist.
        Do not load image or edits.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the node should shutdown.

      • journal

        void journal(long firstTxId,
           int numTxns,
           byte[] data)
       throws IOException
        Receive a batch of edits from the NameNode. Depending on bnState, different actions are taken. See BackupImage.BNState
        Parameters:
        firstTxId - first txid in batch
        numTxns - number of transactions
        data - serialized journal records.
        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
        convergeJournalSpool()

        Write the batch of edits to the local copy of the edit logs.

              int numTxns,
              byte[] data)
                 throws IOException
        Apply the batch of edits to the local namespace.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • convergeJournalSpool

        void convergeJournalSpool()
                    throws IOException
        Transition the BackupNode from JOURNAL_ONLY state to IN_SYNC state. This is done by repeated invocations of tryConvergeJournalSpool until we are caught up to the latest in-progress edits file.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • tryConvergeJournalSpool

        private boolean tryConvergeJournalSpool()
                                 throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • setState

        private void setState(BackupImage.BNState newState)
        Transition edit log to a new state, logging as necessary.

      • namenodeStartedLogSegment

        void namenodeStartedLogSegment(long txid)
                         throws IOException
        Receive a notification that the NameNode has begun a new edit log. This causes the BN to also start the new edit log in its local directories.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • freezeNamespaceAtNextRoll

        void freezeNamespaceAtNextRoll()
        Request that the next time the BN receives a log roll, it should stop applying the edits log to the local namespace. This is typically followed on by a call to waitUntilNamespaceFrozen()

      • waitUntilNamespaceFrozen

        void waitUntilNamespaceFrozen()
                        throws IOException
        After freezeNamespaceAtNextRoll() has been called, wait until the BN receives notification of the next log roll.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Override close() so that we don't finalize edit logs.
